message.body: Sorry for the delay, I checked this around noon and didn't think that anyone else would be on so I didn't recheck.
No worries. It's a beautiful day, have you gotten out to enjoy it?
Not a whole lot, but I'm about to head out for a bike ride. How bout you?
I just walked home by the path along the river. I also snuck out for a short walk and an ice cream bar this afternoon.
Ah, very nice. I usually bike on the path, but I thought it'd prob be swamped today with the weather the way it is, so I took the other side.
It was. Runners, walkers, bikers, strollers, skateboards...geese
The whole lot. Yeah, when it's crowded like that it's impossible to get a steady pace going.
What are some of your preferred good weather activities if you have the free time?
I like hiking, and I've recently discovered kayaking
Nice; outdoorsy. Are there good places to kayak around here, or do you have to go pretty far out of town?
There may be closer places, but I've only gone to lake nockamixon. It's a ways out.
Very nice. I've always been kind of surprised at how many natury areas there are around Philly. Even the city parks can feel pretty removed sometimes.
How bout other forms of entertainment: books, movies, music, etc. Any of these of interest?
